{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=TG3452 |revision=(A) |asin= |series=AC2200 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=06/01/2017 |fcc_id=UIDTG3452 |ic_id=6670A-TG3452 |pcb_id=ARCT04789 |type=wireless router, cable modem, analog phone gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel Puma |cpu1_model=FHCE2752M;Puma 7, FHCE2752M, (SR31B); |cpu1_cspeed=2.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F4G08ABAEAWP-IT |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TC2G63GFR-RDA |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.1 (Gen1) |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Celeno |wi1_chip1_model=CL2440 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Celeno |wi2_chip1_model=CL2432 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Intel |sw_model=PEB7085M <!-- (SLLMJ) --> |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=5GHz Front End Module (FEM);Skyworks;SKY85720-11;SKY, 720, 20001;4; ,,, DOCSIS 3.1 Cable Receiver (Tuner);MaxLinear;MXL278;;1; ,,, DOCSIS 3.1 Upstream Amplifier;MaxLinear;MXL236;;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.1, MoCA 2.0, Wave2, MU-MIMO, battery backup, analog phone port, fan, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ARRIS - XXXX, ARRIS - XXXX-5G }} {{TagLine|Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway}} ''DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi & MoCA 2.0'' :{{ProductPage|https://www.arris.com/products/touchstone-tg3452-cable-voice-gateway/}} {{•}} [https://www.arris.com/globalassets/resources/data-sheets/touchstone-tg3452-data-sheet.pdf Datasheet]
<!--{{FCC ST|11/28/2017|indexme.}}--> 2x192 MHz OFDM in the downstream and 2x96MHz OFDMA :in the upstream along with 32x8 channel bonding<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=32 |up_c=8 }} {{See also|Arris TG3442|Arris MG2402G/CT|Arris TG1672G}}
"Multi Processor Technology with ARM and ATOM based Application Processor" :CPU: [[Intel Puma]] 7 - FHCE2752M (SR31B) @2.5GHz Dual Core :WLAN: [[Celeno]] CL2440 (4T4R AC) + [[Celeno]] CL2432 (3T3R N)
